website_summaries.verdict: This set offers masonry and all purpose bits for a price similar to other regular masonry sets.
pros: Includes five masonry bits and 12 all-purpose bits that are all titanium coated
Masonry bits have carbide tips, while the larger sizes have three flats on the shaft so they don't slip out of the chuck
cons: Doesn't offer as many masonry bits as some other sets

customer_reviews.title: Good Strong Bits
customer_reviews.text: Here is a set of good drill bits. Like most guys, I have a lot of experience with cheapo drill bits, and am willing to pay more for bits that have a little staying power. The masonry bits are what I needed, but I always need the small normal bits, because, well you know, normal men break them because we are not careful enough. The case is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for DIY projects at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the masonry drill bit. Masonry drill bit set costs $10-$18 and for a almost the same price, I get this masonry set and the titanium extra life drill bits. I used these masonry drill bits on a hammer drill to drill holes in 6" thick concrete blocks and it worked great. I was able to use the 5/16 and 3/16 sizes to drill about 16 holes and had no problem. I'm not sure how they will do for heavy duty applications but for the DIYers this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money, save yourself some time and find a better set.
customer_reviews.text: I broke a bit on a piece of aluminum... The concrete ones grind rather than drill, I went to Lowe's to get a better set after hanging one shelf. Skip this, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua L.

customer_reviews.title: The right set of bits, in the right case, at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Complete set of drill bits in well-designed case. Folds into a rectangle to fit into your toolbox. Similar sets in Home Depot and Wal-Mart are much more expensive and make you buy other odd drill bits that you'll never used. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Ross

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy! Some very nice drills at a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! Some very nice drills at a nice price. It doesn't hurt that the storage case is solidly built, easy to open, and looks professional. Thanks for offering a great product.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Good set. Didn't use all the bits but they will do their job very well. Good bit set for DIY people to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price. A must have with a drill.
customer_reviews.text: Saved our butt in Hurricane Irma! Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad case
customer_reviews.text: The buckle on the case is trash. It doesn’t stay clipped and the buckle doesn’t stay attached when the case is open. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Nerbonne

customer_reviews.title: Good drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Made of quality metals. I like it. Although have not used very often, I have this as reserved.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the price and good sturdy case.
customer_reviews.author: beechridge

customer_reviews.title: Masonry bits do not drill masonry
customer_reviews.text: The masonry bits simply do not drill through masonry. 2 thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: casz

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple bits -
customer_reviews.text: a good basic set of bits - - not out a lot of money if you break one - I purchased this for the concrete bits primarily - this bits gave me the biggest bang for my buck
customer_reviews.author: NC10735285

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the mason bits mostly. Have used them on concrete and they work great
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Cheap weak bits. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Aweful drill bits. 2 of the bits sheared wjtgjb the first 30 seconds of use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ratner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent for smaller home improvements, but if you're looking for heavier duty jobs you'll need something of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good bit set
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say they are drill bits nothing fancy but they work.
customer_reviews.author: RobF

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bits AND CASE!
customer_reviews.text: I luv the perfect storage case, only used one bit so far(concrete) held up well, like the great price aslo!
customer_reviews.author: Sanddogg

customer_reviews.title: Went RIGHT into Ceramic Tile! Handled Business
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits did EXACTLY what I needed them to. I had to drill into ceramic tile in my bathroom. Scotch tape was used to mark the spot and voile! Drilled PERFECTLY into the ceramic tile. I was HELLA IMPRESSED :-D I have other drill bits the give me issues in terms of drilling through metal, stone, tile, etc. But these have been absolutely something worth talking about. Props!
customer_reviews.author: Snoop Catt

customer_reviews.title: Received quickly; have not tried them yet
customer_reviews.text: Good price, quick service, but I have not tried them yet, Probably just fine. It's Good to have some spares around!
customer_reviews.author: ProfTom

customer_reviews.title: Great little set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little set for the money. I haven't really used them on any hard materials yet, but for the light duty stuff it has performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bits
customer_reviews.text: For what I ordered it was perfect to hang a shelf that was on a brick wall instead of a wood surface.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is good but not yet to use because is a gift to my brother in Africa.
customer_reviews.author: Bashige Rugemaninzi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lost all my drill bits and this the perfect assortment I need
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product Descriptiob
customer_reviews.text: The product description is for a different set. The largest bit in this set is a 3/8 I ordered and received promptly but had to return. Return process was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dale B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little deceived by the "Masonry Drill bit set", expecting all the bits to be masonry bits. They are not. Only 5 of the bits are masonry, the others for metal. Nevertheless, the bits so far have not disappointed me, and the price is what 5 masonry bits would cost alone, so I am OK with it. Apparently Amazon does not require accurate product descriptions because this has happened to me before. Or, maybe I need to scrutinize each product more closely before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Rau

product_meta.title: MIBRO 871490 Titanium Coated Extra Life Drill Bit and Super Masonry Drill Bit Set, 17 Pieces
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This 12-Piece Super Masonry drill bit set from Mibro - a 60 plus year old company selected as one of Canada's "50 Best Managed Companies" contains two 1/8-Inch, two 5/32-Inch, two 3/16-Inch, three 1/4-Inch, 5/6-Inch, 3/8-Inch and 1/2-Inch masonry drill bits. They have a tough carbide tip for a long service life. All bits 3/16-Inch and larger have 3 flats on the shank to prevent twisting in the drill chuck. Wide spiral flutes quickly remove dust and debris from the cutting area. These bits are designed for rotary drills and are excellent for drilling brick, concrete, stone and ceramic tile (use at a slower speed). They will require more pressure than a hammer drill.
feature_bullets: Ideal for the "Do it yourselfer" with 12 all purpose bits and 5 masonry bits for most home projects
High quality drill bits with professional features like 135-Degree split point to eliminate "skating" and Titanium coated high speed steel on the all purpose bits
The masonry bits have hard carbide tips for long service when drilling in stone, brick and concrete
Easy access storage case with tilt out inserts for quick access to your drill bits
All sizes 3/16-Inch and larger have 3 flats on the shaft to prevent slipping in the drill chuck

specifications.Warranty Description: Guaranteed for the life of the product against defects in materials of workmanship
